todos.title: FOCUS ON FEWER BUT BETTER
todos.body: Work with fewer but higher quality resources.

todos.title: SMARTER NOT HARDER
todos.body: Work to be smarter, not harder.  If you have the option of doing something two ways, always go with the way that is going to make the same task easier the next time.  Don't go with the easy route unless you know you won't repeat the task or it takes 5% of the time and energy.  Growth is determined by being able to do the same task you did yesterday in less time.

todos.title: OUTSOURCE THE NON-CRITICAL
todos.body: Outsource non-critical items of your business to companies that can handle capacity.

todos.title: MISSION CRITICAL
todos.body: Only invest in expenses that are critical to your mission and add value to your customer.

todos.title: NETWORK WITH COMPETITORS
todos.body: Make friends with competitors so that you can use them when advantageous.

todos.title: CULTURAL TRAINING
todos.body: Invest in the time to train all your staff about the culture of the company so that they can re-enforce the core ideology in your absence.

todos.title: STAFF ON DEMAND
todos.body: Have the right but not the requirement to access staff on demand.

todos.title: RESOURCES ON DEMAND
todos.body: Have the right but not the requirement to access resources on demand.

todos.title: LEVERAGE COMMUNITY AND CROWD
todos.body: Get free labor and advice when you can.

todos.title: REMOVE OBSTACLES TO GROWTH
todos.body: Envision what will prevent you from growing and remove those barriers.

todos.title: TRANSPARENCY
todos.body: Encourage transparency so that everyone knows what is going on and anyone can step in your shoes and make informed decisions.

todos.title: CONSISTENT SCALING
todos.body: Don't scale too fast when you are starting and don't scale too slow when you hitting your mark.

todos.title: BUILD A LASTING TEAM
todos.body: Choose your people wisely and for the long run.

todos.title: BUILD FOR TOMORROW'S WORKPLACE
todos.body: Build systems that can handle twice your current capacity.

todos.title: LIBRARY
todos.body: Build a library of easy to access resources.
